Title: Fire in the Hole
Description:
Who are you? But of course, another outlander! I'm Wenbrandt, tamer of cinderbees and creator of cinderbrew.

<Wenbrandt squares himself up as if you should be impressed.>

I had brought barrels of cinderbrew to help the injured. I thought drinking it would ease their pain, but for most it just caused more... burning... pain...

I refuse to let my brew go to waste. Maybe it can be weaponized. The nerubians are just bugs after all--organic and flameable.

This burrow here is a perfect test subject.
ObjectivesText: Use cinderbrew to repel the nerubian attack in the Proscenium.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Regroup with Wenbrandt in the upper stands of The Proscenium.
RewardText: Mountains fall on me, that was incredible! And to think that we've been drinking the stuff...
